<h3 id="X31457">X(31457) = CENTROID OF CURVATURES OF THESE CIRCLES: {CIRCUMCIRCLE, MOSES, STEINER}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 3*a^4-7*(b^2+c^2)*a^2+(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :
<p>X(31457) lies on these lines:
